overview: The way this movie has been made reminded me a little of vintage porn, where a plumber arrives to your house and makes your day completely different. All the scenes have nice little storylines, and all the girls end up having big fun on the day. I loved the first scene, with Adel Asanty. I also loved the scene with Mina. I have to say, all the four scenes are very nice, great DP's. The goal is having fun, and I love to do it with girls who love double penetration. That is the reason for the title - 'Double Trouble' is focused on double penetration. - Rocco Siffredi
title: Rocco's Double Trouble 3
